price: 地上で腐敗*を働き、正しいことをしない者たち（の命令）に」。
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi walā yuṣ'liḥūna
